title: Exclude should apply, if the include is pointing inside the exclude glob
body:
Test failed since exclude not supported
<scenario name="absolute explicit include, relative wildcard exclude (not supported)">
        <_1>##drive####path##\foo\a.foo</_1>
        <_2>foo*</_2>
        <xmake/>
        <msg>[##drive####path##\foo\a.foo]</msg>
 </scenario>

nodes.body: Fix this issue, changeset 1647703 has been checked in d15prerel branch
